extendedInfo.description: Looking for an blood alcohol content level calculator? Try the AlcDroid Blood Alcohol Tester - one of the most easy to use and most flexible blood alcohol calculator of all alcohol test apps out there on Play Store!You are going clubbing with some friends and want to test your alcohol level? With AlcDroid Blood Alcohol Tester you can easily calculate your blood alcohol content level (BAC) by using the approved Watson formula, taking many individual factors like age, gender, height and weight into account! Go and test your blood alcohol level now! This alcohol calculator even regards time and visualizes the degradation of your BAC in a chart.* Unlike other alcohol test apps, AlcDroid Blood Alcohol Tester works very flexible and intuitive. Don't be forced to waste your time by creating large databases of your drinks before being able to start calculating your blood alcohol content. Who wants to create an absinthe dataset, if one does not even drink absinthe usually?* Your recently consumed drinks and personal factors are saved, e.g. for an alcohol test later on. Insert drinks step by step over the whole day!* AlcDroid Blood Alcohol Tester is a alcohol calculator, which supports various units in weight, height, volume, ...* You can share the alcohol calculator result.

reviews.comment: Why do you parasite on name of AlcoDroid?

reviews.title: The best I\'ve tried so far
